802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|Pace 5268AC|Arcadyan|Foxconn}} *'''Future-Proof DSL Compatibility''' :– Supports ADSL, ADSL 2/2+, VDSL2 and the latest Vplus 35b broadband connections. *'''Ultra-Fast Wi-Fi''' :– Perfect for busy home networks, with dual-band Wi-Fi delivering up to 2334Mbps ::combined bandwidth. *'''Unbeatable Wi-Fi Coverage''' :– Four antennas and AiRadar technology reduce dead zones even in the largest homes. *'''Performance to Spare''' :– Two dual-core CPUs provide the processing power for smooth and reliable operation, ::even on the busiest networks. *'''Versatile Telephony''' :– Connect analog phones, fax machines, cordless DECT phones and IP phones to create ::a complete VoIP internet telephony system ===Additional specifications=== * Per ''ASUS'''s product page: :indicates the device has two processors: :one for Wi-Fi and the other for ADSL. * Product segment: AC2400 (600+1734 Mbps) * ''Antenna'': 4x detachable antenna (2dBi) :The device has RP-SMA connectors. * ''Ports'': xDSL: 1x xDSL (RJ11) :WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 :FXS: 2x FON (RJ11), 2x TAE * ''Power Adapter'': :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60HZ) :DC Output : 12V / 3A *''Dimensions (W x H x D)'': [[Dimensions::317 mm x 193 mm x 87 mm]] *''Weight'': [[Weight::1050 g]] ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.adslgr.com/forum/threads/956036-Asus-DSL-AC87VG ''ASUS DSL-AC87VG'' on '''ADSLgr''' forums] *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2640545 ''ASUS DSL Routers'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2783077 ''ASUS DSL-AC87VG'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm63138 BCM63138] @1GHz :Dual Core ARM Cortex A9 SoC
